title: The Minotaur's Mate
description: After years of wandering, Malai and her people have finally found a place to call home. A place hidden away from the eyes o the ruthless rival clans that drove them from their old village and decimated their population. A place far away from the famine and plague they had grown accustomed to.But now they face a new threat.Deep in the woods lurks something sinister. Hunters begin to disappear and soldiers run for their lives. So Malai takes matters into her own hands, refusing to allow this malevolent force destroy her one shot at true happiness. But when she’s captured she quickly learns there’s a price to pay for freedom, and the Minotaur in the woods lusts for much more than just blood…Available at Amazon http://amzn.com/B00IDAHDCW
author: Madeline Monoghan
